title: GAP#2 - Ghost Admission Proposal
body:
Proposal Summary

Proposal for admission of Ghost Maker shacketh to assume a new Ghost Maker role as Governance Facilitator - GF - to act as the project's gov reference, and lead, and manage the creation of GF’s Gov Facilitators team.

Motivation 

To ensure that this active member in the governance sphere joins the governance facilitation team in the next stages of the project and also to designate him to develop the team to work in the Gov Facilitation area.

Protocol Agent Credentials

@shacketh - Early Ghost, Ghost Maker for HR and TMF  @ Ghost Finance
Research, architecture, and processes on behalf of Ghost Finance DAO
Contributor GFDao Litepaper

@luizão - Early Ghost, Ghost Maker HR, and CM  @ Ghost Finance
GFDao’s UX and UI Contributor
Project’s MVP Designer 

Relevant Information

For more information about CGD Bounty and Vesting requirements check our Litepaper visiting the link below:
https://docs.ghost.finance/
choices: No, I do NOT APPROVE GAP#2
author: 0x56d78862dcC0bf47C87bdE39BAD9a5A4e9085D00
